info.name: Next.js POS System API
info.description: Complete API collection for Next.js POS System with authentication, tenant management, orders, products, customers, and admin functionality

body.raw:
{
  "customerName": "John Doe Updated",
  "customerId": "customer-uuid",
  "customerPhone": "+628123456789",
  "totalAmount": 85000,
  "discountAmount": 0,
  "taxAmount": 8500,
  "grandTotal": 93500,
  "paidAmount": 95000,
  "paymentMethod": "Cash",
  "paymentStatus": "paid",
  "orderStatus": "completed",
  "pointUsed": 0,
  "orderItems": [
    {
      "productId": "product-uuid-1",
      "productName": "Nasi Goreng Special",
      "productPrice": 35000,
      "qty": 2
    },
    {
      "productId": "product-uuid-2",
      "productName": "Es Teh Manis",
      "productPrice": 15000,
      "qty": 1
    }
  ]
}

{
  "name": "Nasi Goreng Spesial",
  "price": 25000,
  "type": "food",
  "productCategoryId": "category-uuid",
  "description": "Nasi goreng dengan telur dan ayam",
  "isActive": true
}

{
  "name": "Nasi Goreng Spesial Updated",
  "price": 30000,
  "type": "food",
  "productCategoryId": "category-uuid",
  "description": "Nasi goreng dengan telur, ayam, dan udang",
  "isActive": true
}

{
  "name": "Jane Smith Updated",
  "username": "jane.smith.updated",
  "phone": "+628987654321",
  "address": "456 Updated Staff Street",
  "salary": 3500000,
  "isOwner": false
}

{
  "name": "Order Created",
  "event": "ORDER_CREATED",
  "message": "Hello {{customerName}}, your order has been created with total {{grandTotal}}. Thank you!",
  "isActive": true,
  "isCustom": false
}

{
  "name": "New Customer Discount",
  "type": "percentage",
  "value": 10,
  "minimumPurchase": 50000,
  "isActive": true,
  "description": "10% discount for new customers"
}

{
  "name": "Updated Customer Discount",
  "type": "percentage",
  "value": 15,
  "minimumPurchase": 75000,
  "isActive": true,
  "description": "15% discount for valued customers"
}

{
  "title": "Special Promotion",
  "description": "Get 20% off on all items",
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/banner-image.jpg",
  "link": "https://example.com/promotion",
  "isActive": true,
  "startDate": "2024-01-01",
  "endDate": "2024-01-31"
}

{
  "title": "Updated Special Promotion",
  "description": "Get 25% off on all items",
  "imageUrl": "https://example.com/updated-banner-image.jpg",
  "link": "https://example.com/updated-promotion",
  "isActive": true,
  "startDate": "2024-01-01",
  "endDate": "2024-02-29"
}
